a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: This data is not adjusted for cross-country differences in the cost of living. It is adjusted for inflation. TFP is
measured relative to each country's TFP in 2017.
Data source: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021)
